resources.string: Spin to the item you would like to learn more about...
Fresh arugula leaves are tossed in creamy lemon vinaigrette with grape tomatoes and parmesan cheese.\n
Autumn squash stuffed agnolotti is served in a parmesan-brown butter sauce topped with pomegranate seeds, crispy sage leaves, crumbled amaretto cookie, pumpkin seeds, and shaved parmesan.\n

Slow roasted turkey breast dusted with 5 spice powder on toasted ciabatta bread with pickled vegetables (carrots, jalapenos, red onion and cucumbers), fresh cilantro, lettuce, and sriracha mayo served with miso soup (miso, mushrooms, dashi, scallions).\n
Cinnamon apple bread pudding with raisin-fig jam, salted caramel ice cream, and caramel sauce\n

Brussels sprouts are blanched in a mixture of soy sauce, water, and salt. The Brussels are, then, dusted in rice flour and fried until very crispy. The crispy Brussels are tossed in a spicy sambal glaze and garnished with sliced scallions.

Romaine hearts (the tender inner portion of romaine lettuce) are tossed with garlic croutons, parmesan cheese, and Caesar dressing. Our housemade Caesar dressing contains: egg yolks, anchovy filets, Dijon mustard, garlic, lemon juice, red wine vinegar, parmesan cheese, onion, Tabasco, Worcestershire, salt, black peppers, olive oil, canola oil, and capers. What separates it from others is that we blend equal parts of capers, anchovies and garlic and roast them in olive oil for an hour and a half. This adds a very robust flavor to the dressing.
Flourless chocolate cake served with milk chocolate malt ice cream, raspberry sauce, and chocolate malt balls.
Oreo cheesecake served with an oreo tuile, crumbled oreo pieces, and white chocolate ice cream\n

Chicken breast is dredged in Madras style curry (Madras is a intensely flavorful and spicy curry blend from the south of India), then pan-seared and roasted. The chicken is served with Israeli couscous, diced apples, golden raisins, red onions, and arugula. It is accompanied by a honey-curry cream.

Donuts: impastata ricotta, sugar, egg, baking powder, flour, amaretto, salt, cinnamon
	Lemon sauce: lemon juice, lemoncello, egg, butter, salt
	Raspberry coulis: raspberry puree, pectin, sugar, lemon juice, salt
	Chocolate sauce: chocolate, xanthan, water, sugar, corn syrup
7 oz of hand cut French fries tossed in housemade Caesar dressing, parmesan cheese, and parsley.\n
Green Plantains are sliced thinly and deep fried until crispy and golden brown. The chips are then tossed in our sweet/spicy seasoning and served in a pail with a side of guacamole.

Grilled lamb strip loin is marinated in a Lebanese-Style marinade and served on house made pita with, tzatziki sauce, shredded lettuce, roasted tomatoes, shaved marinated onion, julienned cucumber and feta. The sandwich is served with a warm salad of chickpeas, spinach, almonds, sunflower seeds, dates, and apricots.

A chicken breast with the wing bone attached is breaded with flour, eggwash, and breadcrumbs mixed with parmesan, lemon zest, and parsley. It is sautéed in and then butter and oil then finished in the oven. Served with an arugula salad with lemon citronette, roasted tomato, and shaved parmesan cheese. Garnished with a grilled half lemon.
A mixture of Green Leaf, Red Leaf, Lola Rosa, Tongas, Batavia, and Oak lettuces is tossed with shaved carrots, radish, cucumbers, croutons, and housemade balsamic vinaigrette.

Prince Edward Island Mussels are gently steamed in white wine and garlic and then finished with butter and parsley. Served with our \"World Class\" garlic bread (softened butter, garlic, parmesan cheese, parsley spread onto a slices baguette and grilled on the plancha.)\n

Thickly sliced eggplant is layered with mozzarella, roasted tomatoes, spinach, and basil pesto and baked crispy with bread crumbs and grana padano cheese. Served over marinara and topped with basil leaf and toasted pine nuts.\n

Gulf shrimp and tender morsels of chicken are stir fired with rice noodles, peanuts, bean sprouts, egg, and red peppers. Served in a flavorful broth containing tamarind and fish sauce. Garnished with cilantro leaves, peanuts, and scallion.\n
Fresh popcorn is tossed in melted butter, truffle oil, and grated parmesan cheese.\n
Sweet and spicy pumpkin and black bean chili topped with lime cream, toasted pumpkin seeds, and fresh cilantro.\n

Two six inch flour tortillas are loaded with Latin braised pork belly, bacon, Oaxaca cheese, and roasted corn and black bean salsa. The tortillas are seared, cut and served with guacamole, pice de gallo, and chipotle sour cream, all served on out three compartment Kyoto ramekin.\n

Our fresh pasta dough is stuffed with minced cremini mushrooms slowly cooked with truffle oil, garlic, and grana padano cheese. At service, the raviolis are topped with our wild mushroom mix (shiitake, oyster, and beeche sautéed with garlic), white wine butter sauce, grape tomatoes, roasted garlic, and arugula. Garnished with grated truffle pecorino cheese. (Raviolis are made fresh at Lia\'s and delivered daily)\n

A six ounce portion of salmon fillet is dusted in Moroccan spices and seared to the guest’s desired temperature. The salmon is served atop a salad of chick peas, almond, sunflower seeds, dates, apricots, and a chiffonade of spinach. The plate is accented with a carrot-infused yogurt.\n
Two spring rolls are loaded with soy braised rabbit, cabbage slaw, and rice vermicelli noodles. The spring rolls are fried and served with a housemade thai dipping sauce.
Squid rings lightly dredged in flour, deep fried, and dusted in a sweet-spicy seasoning blend. They are accompanied by spicy aioli, lemon wedge, and mesclun greens tossed in balsamic vinaigrette.

Wild catfish is seasoned with blackening spice and pan seared. Served in two of our housemade flour tortillas and topped with latin slaw, roasted corn-black bean relish, and avocado crema. Served with a side of crispy plantains, guacamole, and tomatillo sauce.\n
Lemon tart made with corn ritz cracker streusel, blueberry compote, and blackberry sauce.\n

A six ounce fillet of rainbow trout is seared until skin is crispy and served atop a puree of celery root-thyme whipped potatoes, sautéed swiss chard, caramelized shallots, and garnished with a pomegranate buerre rouje and pomegranate seeds.
